function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mode of transmission through close contact","Impact":"Rapid spread and infection of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promoting social distancing and minimizing close contact","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of mobile phone location data for forecasting epidemics","Impact":"Potential privacy concerns and data misuse","Mitigation":"Anonymizing or aggregating data, obtaining informed consent","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, consent management systems","People":"Data subjects, researchers","Owner":"Data protection authorities, research ethics committees"},{"Description":"Utilization of ecological niche model (ENM) for identifying potential risk zones","Impact":"Misinterpretation of risk zones, leading to ineffective interventions","Mitigation":"Validation of model outputs, expert review of findings","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, expert review platforms","People":"Local government, public health agencies","Owner":"Geospatial analysts, public health experts"}]}
